perks.name: Big Leagues
perks.description: Swing for the fences! Do 20% more melee weapon damage

perks.name: Cap Collector
perks.description: You've mastered the art of the deal! Buying and selling prices at vensors are better.

perks.name: Chemist
perks.description: Any chems you take last 50% longer. Far out

perks.name: Covert Operations
perks.description: You are more difficult to detect while sneaking

perks.name: Gun Nut
perks.description: Shoot first, kill first, with access to base level and Rank 1 gun mods

perks.name: Hacker
perks.description: Knowledge of cuttin-edge computer encrytion allows you to hack Advanced terminals.

perks.name: Iron Fist
perks.description: Channel you chi to unleast devastating fury! PUnching attackes do 20% more damage to you opponent.

perks.name: Medic
perks.description: Is there a doctor in the house? Stimpaks restore 40% of lost Health, and RadAway removes 40% of radiation.

special.name: Strength
special.description: Strength is a measure of you raw physical power. It affect how much you can carry, and the damage of all melee attacks

special.name: Perception
special.description: Perception is you environmental awareness and "sixth sense" and affect weapon accuracy in V.A.T.S.

special.name: Endurence
special.description: Endurange is a measure of you overall physical fitness. It affects you total Health and Action Point drain from sprinting.

special.name: Charisma
special.description: Charisma is you ability to charm and convince others. It affects you success to persuade in dialuge and prices when you barter.

special.name: Intelligence
special.description: Intelligence is a measure of you overall mental acuity, and affects the number of Experience Points earned.

special.name: Agility
special.description: Agility is a measure of you overall finess and reflexes. It affects the number of Action Points in V.A.T.S and you ability to sneak.

special.name: Luck
special.description: Luck is a measure of you general good fortune, and affects the recharge rate of Critical Hits.

weapons.name: Freezing Pipe Revolver Pistol
weapons.description: Does 10 points cryo damage and will freeze targets on critical hits.
